<<<<<<< HEAD
The vnbeleevers preparing for Christ. By T.H. Hooker, Thomas, 1586-1647.
[4], 204, [4], 119, [5] p.
Printed by Tho Cotes for Andrew Crooke, and are to be sold at the Blacke Beare in Saint Pauls Churchyard, London : 1638.
T.H. = Thomas Hooker. Includes bibliography. A second section with caption title "Preparing for Christ" has separate pagination and register recommencing with 3A1. Running title reads: Preparing for Christ. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
